== Bio ==
Sven Stafström is Director General for the Swedish Research Council. In
1981 he graduate Fellowship at Department of Physics and Measurement
Technology (IFM), Linköping University (LiU), and he has since 1981 a
Master of Science, (LiU), Linköping, Sweden.

Since 2000- he was a Professor and Head of the Computational Physics
group, IFM.

In 2001 he becomes Full Professor in Computational Physics, IFM,
Linköping, Sweden.
